sentence.Network_en: Monks shave their heads, as do devotees of the Hare Krishna movement.
sentence.Network_cn: 和尚要剃度，克利须那派教徒也一样。

sentence.Network_en: If you have long curly hair, don't shave it off.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你有一头卷曲的长发，不要剪掉。

sentence.Network_en: The wrong shampoo can leave curly hair in a tangled mess.
sentence.Network_cn: 不合适的洗发水会使卷发纠结成乱糟糟的一团。

list.abs: 卷曲的,有卷发的a curly-headed girl 头发卷曲的女孩 currencyn. 货币foreign currencies 外币[同]moneyn. 流通,通用[难点]give currency to sth. 使…流行,传播.
curly [ k  li] a.( curlier; curliest) (of hair) having curls or waves curly hair 鬈发 / a curly headed girl 长着一头鬈发的姑娘.

means.word_mean: 1. shrubby clematis of the eastern United States having curly foliage
